directions: In a bowl or pitcher, combine the orange, cranberry, apple and pineapple juices.
Pour in the lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, champagne, and frozen strawberries. Wait a minute or two for the strawberries to moisten up, then pour into glasses and serve.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
title: Juicy Fruit Punch with Champagne
